snippet: The Knicks went on a 27-11 run in the final seven minutes, erasing a 12-point deficit and handing the Spurs their first home loss of the season.
abstract: New York Knicks defeat San Antonio Spurs, 104-100, and remain undefeated on the season.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks went on a 27-11 run in the final seven minutes, erasing a 12-point deficit and handing the Spurs their first home loss of the season.

headline.seo: Knicks, Saving Best for Last, Go to 6-0
headline.main: Saving Best for Last, Knicks Go to 6-0
headline.print_headline: Saving Best for Last, Knicks Go to 6-0
